item.title: Thousands attend state funeral of former Kenyan Prime Minister Odinga
item.description: Mourners carrying national flags and portraits of the late leader pay their final respects at a city stadium.

item.title: Airline apologises for asking dead flight attendant for paperwork
item.description: The woman's death has triggered widespread anger in Taiwan following speculation that she was overworked.

item.title: Zelensky to make case for missiles at White House, after Trump and Putin agree meeting
item.description: Ukraine's leader will meet Trump in Washington a day after the US president agreed to face-to-face talks with his Russian counterpart.

item.title: Netanyahu 'determined' to pressure Hamas to find remaining dead hostages
item.description: The Israeli prime minister's comments come after Hamas said it could not access the bodies of 19 hostages in Gaza.

item.title: Author of I Want To Die But I Want To Eat Tteokbokki dies at 35
item.description: South Korean writer Baek Se-hee was known for her 2018 bestselling memoir about her struggle with depression.
